name: [Beta] Trick or Treat
description:
One Halloween night...

You are trick or treating, showing off your classic ghost costume, when you wander into a more remote part of the neighborhood. While looking around for others, you fall into a hidden hole in the ground! Where does this lead??

You wake up in a dark stone space with creepy monsters closing in on you and a spooky voice that talks from nowhere. What do you have to defend yourself? Well... this piece of candy is pretty rock solid but you'll have to be careful not to run out.

Controls:

  • Movement - arrow keys
  • Jump - space bar
  • Sprint - shift key
  • Shoot candy - E
  • Kick - W
